questions.question: Without tuning circuit no ........................ would be possible

explanations.a: Correct; tuning is essential in selecting signals for communication.
explanations.b: Oscillation does not require tuning circuit necessarily.
explanations.d: Filtering is related but not the main role.

questions.question: Which one of the following RC filter is not widely used?

explanations.b: All pass filters are not as widely used.
explanations.c: Low pass filters are widely used.
explanations.d: High pass filters are widely used.

questions.question: Which one of the following is not a passive component in electric circuit?

explanations.b: Correct; transistor is an active component.
